description:
Years of my experience in overseas Bible missions, to hostile and anti-Christian territories, are brought to you here for your convenience and edification. This course will ALWAYS BE FREE.

This course will explain how to understand the true context and meaning of God's Word so that one can conduct a proper and accurate personal Bible study on their own. 

First we will conduct a quick lesson on how to gain a complete CONTEXTUAL understanding of scripture passages in a manner God intended for the message to be received, not in a manner the reader, or someone behind a podium, wants to receive it. 

Secondly we will breeze through some online tools (free & no registration required) that will assist you on gaining true perspective of a passage as it relates to the time period, audience, and cultures in which it was written, and how we are to apply it to ourselves now. 

The core of this course is to teach you an easy 1-2-3 step method of studying the Bible in a manner that will give you better understanding, meaning, and life application. This is not a 'Bible in a year' plan. This is a 'Know The Bible & Its Message' plan regardless of how long or quick it takes you to read it. 

If you need a Bible. Send me a message with your address and I will ship one out to you...for free. Its a nice Bible too. It's a ministry my wife and I conduct. 

I hope to see you in the course! God Bless!
title: Learn to Become a Bible Study Pro! (All levels)
